effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Hood of Hungering Darkness

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 76,522 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Use: Summon Pitbot Geardo to assist you for 5 sec, coating nearby enemies with rancid motor oil for additional threat. Geardo ensures you take the blame.

Geardo departs explosively to deal 928,386 Fire damage split between nearby enemies, increased by 15% if recently oiled. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Your melee and ranged attacks have a chance to increase your Critical Strike by 2,778 for 10 sec.
Equip: Being one of the devout grants an additional 261 Strength.

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Fallen Crusader

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,024 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Maw of the Damned

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
